main event: On 6 October 1965, a civilian employee at Edwards Air Force Base observed several lights in the sky that appeared to be stationary and varied in intensity over a period of approximately 5 minutes.
interesting points: The lights were located approximately 400 yards north of the base and at an altitude of 300-400 feet., The lights dimmed and brightened independently before extinguishing simultaneously., The observer reported the incident to the Air Force Police Control Center at 2340 hours., An Air Force Investigator was dispatched but could not determine the source of the lights., No other witnesses were located during the investigation.
sighted object: multiple stationary lights in the sky
